doc.field: Nicholas Pavlik
Nicholas Pavlik
Brooklyn and New York City business catalogs collection
Brooklyn and New York City business catalogs collection

This collection contains sales catalogs of businesses located in Brooklyn and New York City, including Bellows & Company Wines, E.W. Bliss Company, South Brooklyn Moulding Mill, Abraham & Straus, Dr. Jaeger's Sanitary Woolen System Company, and the Bedell Company.

This collection contains sales catalogs of businesses located in Brooklyn and New York City, including Bellows & Company Wines, E.W. Bliss Company, South Brooklyn Moulding Mill, Abraham & Straus, Dr. Jaeger's Sanitary Woolen System Company, and the Bedell Company.
